name: The Hunt for the BTK Killer
summary_text: After 31 years at-large, detectives in Wichita, Kansas home in on the serial killer known as BTK.

name: Six: The Mark Unleashed
summary_text: In the last days before Armaggeddon, three men must made one eternal choice: receive the mark of the devil or stand for Christ. This movie will make you think about your own life choices.

name: Pippi Longstocking
summary_text: Pippi is a little girl who lives alone in her house, while her father is sailing the seas. With Pippi we meet her horse, her monkey and her two friends Tommy and Anika. Together they go on many journeys through the neighborhood.

name: Winnetou and the Crossbreed
summary_text: On her b-day, settler's daughter Apanatschi receives her father's secret gold mine but greedy neighboring prospectors resort to murder and kidnapping in order to get the gold, forcing the girl and her brother to seek Winnetou's protection.

name: The Row
summary_text: A college freshman discovers a dark secret about the sorority house she's pledging for after a series of murders terrorize the campus.

name: Raising the Bar
summary_text: A teenager who gave up her spot in an elite U.S. gymnastics program when her family moved to Australia enters a competition to help a new friend.

name: The Rift: Dark Side of the Moon
summary_text: An American military satellite crash lands in Eastern Serbia and a team of US and Serbian agents are dispatched to secure the remains of the satellite, but when they locate the crash site all is not as it seems.

name: Christmas Magic
summary_text: After a terrible car accident, Carrie Blackford must earn her wings in heaven as a guardian angel to Scott Walker and his daughter Abby. But she might lose her wings when she falls in love with Scott.

name: One Piece: Episode of Alabaster - Sabaku no Ojou to Kaizoku Tachi
summary_text: In a retelling of the Arabasta Episodes. The Straw Hat Pirates are helping Vivi save her kingdom from being destroyed by a set up war. Which all began when the first drought occurred 3 ...                See full summary »

name: De brief voor de koning
summary_text: The medieval quest of sixteen-year old Tiuri, who risks his future as a Knight to fulfill a promise, and in so doing discovers adventure, honor, valor and love.

name: Time Share
summary_text: Two single parents, one man and one woman, along with their kids, have to involuntarily share a house for their holidays.

name: Double Trouble
summary_text: When singer Guy Lambert goes on tour in Europe, he is pursued by two beautiful women, bumbling jewel thieves, and a mysterious killer.

name: L'aîné des Ferchaux
summary_text: Broke French ex-paratrooper turned amateur boxer Michel Maudet becomes bodyguard for the fugitive corrupt banker Ferchaux.

name: Saint Amour
summary_text: Chaos ensues when a father and son travel to a farm festival via the Wine Trail in a Parisian taxi.

name: Let Me Make You a Martyr
summary_text: A cerebral revenge film about two adopted siblings who fall in love, and hatch a plan to kill their abusive father.

name: The Seven Year Hitch
summary_text: Two best friends accidentally take their relationship to the next level and suddenly find themselves saying 'I do.'

name: Nearlyweds
summary_text: Revolves around three friends who have dream weddings only to find out that the pastor who married them failed to complete the key paperwork required to make them official.

name: Linhas de Wellington
summary_text: On September 27, 1810, the French troops commanded by Marshal Massena, were defeated in the Serra do Buçaco by the Anglo-Portuguese army of general Wellington. Despite the victory, ...                See full summary »

name: The Possession of David O'Reilly
summary_text: When David comes to their Victorian apartment in search of help, Alex and Kate welcome in their old friend. However they soon learn that David is convinced demonic monsters are trying to break in.

name: Stratosphere Girl
summary_text: Enter a dark, dangerous world where the lines between reality and fantasy are blurred. Angela is 18, a stunning Dutch blonde, a comic illustrator, and bored with life. Eager for adventure, ...                See full summary »

name: Zatoichi's Flashing Sword
summary_text: After being wounded in a fight, Zatoichi is nursed to health by a young woman and her father. Now indebted to the family, he works to protect their ferry business from local thugs.

name: The Violent Years
summary_text: Paula Parkins is the teenage daughter of wealthy parents who don't seem to make time for her, so she looks for thrills as the leader of her all girl gang who steal, rob, and rape young men.

name: Mister 880
summary_text: Gentle romantic comedy about a Secret Service Agent trying to catch a cold case counterfeiter and a United Nations translator.

name: The Black Camel
summary_text: The unsolved murder of a Hollywood actor several years earlier and an enigmatic psychic are the keys to help Charlie solve the Honolulu stabbing death of a beautiful actress.

name: The Red Mill
summary_text: A tavern worker and the daughter of a burgomaster enter into elaborate masquerades in order to win the hearts of the men they love.

name: Why Change Your Wife?
summary_text: Robert and Beth Gordon are married but share little. He runs into Sally at a cabaret and the Gordons are soon divorced. Just as he gets bored with Sally's superficiality, Beth strives to ...                See full summary »

name: Dirty God
summary_text: A young British mother struggles to reclaim her life after a brutal acid attack leaves her severely scarred.

name: Porta dos Fundos: Contrato Vitalício
summary_text: An up-and-coming actor, Rodrigo, makes a deal with his friend, Miguel, to be in every single film he directs. In that same night Miguel disappears, only to be found years later with an unusual plot for their next movie.

name: Pedar
summary_text: Mehrollah is a 14-year-old boy who is forced to find a job to support his family after his father dies. He travels to the southern parts of Iran, looking for work. Upon his return to his hometown, he notices certain changes in his family.

name: Cisco Pike
summary_text: A down on his luck former drug dealer is forced by a corrupt LAPD policeman to sell 100 kilos of confiscated marijuana in one weekend.

name: The Cow and I
summary_text: In 1942, a French prisoner of war in Germany decides to escape to France using a cow held by a lunge as a decoy. He crosses all Germany in this way.

name: Dakota
summary_text: In 1871 Dakota, two crooked businessmen oppose the local wheat farmers and the railroad development, in order to control the town of Fargo.

name: Velipadinte Pusthakam
summary_text: Professor Mathew Idikkula, who reformed the atmosphere of a college by developing a healthy relationship between teachers and students. The film reflects the goodness of the youth and the impact the students can have. It also takes a round-up on the revenge of the death of founding father of the college by killing his assasin.

name: Efterskalv
summary_text: When John returns home to his father after serving time in prison, he is looking forward to starting his life afresh. However, in the local community his crime is neither forgotten nor forgiven.

name: Home from Home: Chronicle of a Vision
summary_text: Jakob longs for a new life for himself and his troubled family in Brazil.

name: The Human Resources Manager
summary_text: A tragi-comedy centered on the HR manager of Israel's largest industrial bakery, who sets out to save the reputation of his business and prevent the publication of a defamatory article.

name: Love Hurts
summary_text: A newly separated father has to learn how to date again with help from his teenage son who himself dreams of conquering one girl's heart.

name: Yi sa bui lai
summary_text: A Macao police officer's bachelor life is interrupted by the daughter he never knew he fathered.

name: Onmyoji: The Yin Yang Master
summary_text: When samurai Hiromasa comes to Seimei, Kyoto's court Onmyoji (a fortune teller in commune with the spirits), to warn of a plot against the government, the two discover that the court's formidable magician, Doson, is indeed planning a coup.

name: The Boys
summary_text: Brett Sprague is a violent and psychopathic man, who is released on parole after serving a sentence for assault. As he returns to his family house and we watch him and his brothers, Stevie ...                See full summary »

name: Madame Sousatzka
summary_text: Renowned Russian piano teacher Irina Sousatzka gets a new student - Bengali piano prodigy Manek. They are both immigrants in the UK and bond quickly. When Manek's single mother's business fails, he must make a career decision.

name: The Cruel Ones
summary_text: An ex-Confederate and his sons plan to use stolen money as a way to revive the Confederacy.

name: Has Anybody Seen My Gal
summary_text: An aging heir-less millionaire wants to leave his fortune to the unsuspecting family of his first love but not before testing his prospective heirs by living with them under the guise of a poor boarder.

name: We Dive at Dawn
summary_text: All leave is cancelled so that a British submarine can be sent after a new German warship. They chase it so far that they have no fuel to get home.

name: The Man Who Could Work Miracles
summary_text: An ordinary man suddenly finds that anything he says comes true. Or at least, almost anything.

name: My Stupid Boss
summary_text: Diana (Bunga Citra Lestari) lives in Kuala Lumpur following her husband who works there. Diana then applied to work at a company owned by Bossman. Bossman happened to be her husband's college friend while in America.

name: Cities of Last Things
summary_text: This is a story about a common man who has extraordinary events in his mundane life. The film depicts the protagonist's turns of events in three eras, three seasons, three nights, in the same city, as told with reverse chronology.

name: Party Girl
summary_text: An aging nightclub hostess decides to settle down and get married.

name: WrestleMania XXX
summary_text: With a year of frustration with The Authority, Daniel Bryan seeks to win it all on the grandest stage of them all, Bray Wyatt looks to get into John Cena's head and Brock Lesnar does the unthinkable.

name: Nae anaeui modeun geot
summary_text: Du-hyeon can't stand his wife anymore. He wants a divorce but he's weak. He hires a Casanova to seduce her and make her leave him. Will he succeed?

name: All I Wish
summary_text: An aspiring fashion designer struggles to find success and love. The story cuts into her life once a year, always on the same date: her birthday.

name: Seoyang-goldong-yanggwajajeom Aentikeu
summary_text: Jin-hyeok opens a cake shop in an old antique shop, hiring Seun-woo, Korea's best pastry chef, who fell in love with him in high school. Also there, are Soo-young, crushing on Seun-woo, ex-boxer Gi-beom, and Seun-woo's French ex-boyfriend.

name: Figli
summary_text: Sara and Nicola are expecting their second son. Through the late Mattia Torre's sharp look, all the joys and sorrows of being a parent in the modern day Italy are unraveled in an absolutely brilliant and witty way.

name: Scorcher
summary_text: The only hope for humanity to survive a natural disaster is to detonate a nuclear bomb in Los Angeles, California.

name: The Immortals
summary_text: A seedy night-club owner recruits eight violent gangsters for an elaborate heist. But when they all begin to compare notes, they find they're pawns in a dangerous game of double-cross.

name: Holy Matrimony
summary_text: A young Hutterite boy must marry his late brother's wife who comes from outside the community.

name: The Rainbow
summary_text: A young woman deals in her own personal way with the trials of adolescence and young adulthood in early 1900s England.

name: Out of Bounds
summary_text: Daryl's parents ship him off to the big city to live with his brother, hoping he will have a better life there. After a baggage mix-up at the airport, Daryl finds himself in possession of a drug cache, which a drug dealer wants back.

name: The Joke
summary_text: In the 1950's, Ludvik Jahn was expelled from the Communist Party and the University by his fellow students, because of a politically incorrect note he sent to his girlfriend. Fifteen years ...                See full summary »

name: Crack-Up
summary_text: Art curator George Steele experiences a train wreck...which never happened. Is he cracking up, or the victim of a plot?

name: Hans Westmar
summary_text: This Nazi propaganda film purports to show the story of a Nazi Storm Trooper named Horst Wessel--here called "Hans Westmar"--who took part in street brawls and assassinations in Berlin in ...                See full summary »

name: June
summary_text: The life story of a girl named June from 16 years of her age until she turned 26, thereby giving an insight into those ten years of her life.

name: The Trap
summary_text: A man returns home to Atlanta to help his brother's struggling restaurant.

name: A Ring by Spring
summary_text: Always cynical of marriage, a confident business consultant finally gets a wake-up call when a fortuneteller predicts she will have a ring by spring or never marry and scrambles to avoid a destiny of a lifetime alone before it's too late.

name: Omar m'a tuer
summary_text: In the summer of 1991 an elderly woman Ghislaine Marchal is found murdered in the basement of her home with the message "Omar M'a Tuer" (Omar has kill me) written beside in her own blood. ...                See full summary »

name: Roadside Romeo
summary_text: This is the story of Romeo. A dude who was living the life. He had the works - the mansion to live in, the chicks to party with and the cars to be driven around in. Until one day, the ...                See full summary »

name: 5 Against the House
summary_text: Four vets attending college on the GI Bill and a cabaret singer try to rob a Reno Casino and pull off the perfect crime.

name: The Red Inn
summary_text: A group of travelers, including a monk, stay in a lonely inn in the mountains. The host confesses the monk his habit of serving a soporific soup to the guests, to rob their possessions and ...                See full summary »

name: Tonight or Never
summary_text: A young opera singer finds her career stalled because of her cold and passionless performances, until she finds romance with a handsome admirer.

name: Petit paysan
summary_text: When one of his cows gets sick, a farmer will stop at nothing to save the rest of the herd.

name: Sai de ke · ba lai: Cai hong qiao
summary_text: After the uprising at Wushe, Mona Rudao faces a guerrilla war against the militarily superior Japanese and Seediq clans. He and his followers must fight for their dignity and honor so that they can truly be "Seediq Bale" or "real men."

name: Submerged
summary_text: A young woman and her friends, who've been targeted by kidnappers, must do everything they can to survive after their limo is forced off the road and plunged into a canal.

name: Drei Zimmer/Küche/Bad
summary_text: Eight friends help each other repeatedly move house. One year of moving, from apartment to apartment, from shared flat to shared flat. These changes of the apartment are also a changes of relations -some break, others grow.

name: Our Planet: Behind the Scenes
summary_text: Behind the Scenes look at the hardships and drama of capturing footage from Our Planet.

name: Bloody Mary
summary_text: When a group of psychiatric hospital nurses invoke the spirit of Bloody Mary-a supposed urban myth-the slaughter begins. First, a young nursing assistant disappears, her body never found. ...                See full summary »

name: Played
summary_text: An examination of the malevolent London underworld with its despicable criminal underground. Ray (Mick Rossi) just finished an eight-year prison sentence after getting set up. Now he is back on the streets to settle the score.

name: Hum Kisi Se Kum Nahin
summary_text: Munna Bhai, a dreaded Mumbai gangster, falls in love with a young woman named Komal. Things go hilariously awry when Munna sets out to marry her and has to fight off Dr. Rastogi, her brother, and Raja, her vagabond boyfriend.

name: The Inkwell
summary_text: A shy, troubled young man who set his own house on fire and has an imaginary friend, is sent to a vineyard where he finds himself in the middle of his political-arguing, party-loving family and his love torn between two girls.

name: Avenging Angel
summary_text: Molly, former prostitute, has managed to leave her street life with help from Lt. Andrews. She studies law and leads a normal life. When Andrews is killed by a brutal gang, she returns to the streets as Angel to find his killers.

name: No Way Out
summary_text: A mob hitman wants to retire, but his bosses don't think that's a good idea. Complications--and many bloody shootouts-ensue.

name: Schlock
summary_text: A small town is terrorized by "The Banana Killer", which turns out to be the missing link between man and ape.

name: Teenage Cave Man
summary_text: A young man defies tribal laws and searches for answers. The result of his quest yields knowledge of past generations.

name: Tribute to a Bad Man
summary_text: With no law within 200 miles horse rancher Jeremy Rodak runs his spread with an iron hand and deals with rustlers even more ruthlessly.

name: Only the Valiant
summary_text: A despised cavalry commander is unfairly blamed by his troop for the death of a popular officer and must redeem himself in front of his men during an Indian attack on the fort.

name: Driven
summary_text: Emerson Graham's nights as a cab driver are filled with annoyances and inconveniences, but until tonight, never attacks and disappearances. After picking up a mysterious passenger her ...                See full summary »

name: Trouble Is My Business
summary_text: Detective Roland Drake falls for two sisters from the Montemar family. One woman is dead and the other wants to kill him.

name: Arang
summary_text: A salt storehouse near the sea may be haunted. A penniless ex-con dies a gristly death in a house he can ill afford. The detectives assigned the case are Min, newly reinstated after a ...                See full summary »

name: Los 2 lados de la cama
summary_text: Three years have passed and the boys seem to have matured. Javier is going to marry Marta and Pedro is very much in love with his new girlfriend Raquel. Rafa has also found happiness with ...                See full summary »

name: Nerukku Ner
summary_text: Raghu and shanti are divorced couple which sparks problems between Suriya(shanti's brother) and Vijay(Raghu's brother).

name: Phool Aur Kaante
summary_text: A young man who despises his father's criminal profession, wants to live a peaceful life away from him but fate has some other plans.

name: 'R Xmas
summary_text: A New York drug dealer is kidnapped, and his wife must try to come up with the money and drugs to free him from his abductors before Christmas.

name: Sue
summary_text: An unemployed ex-office worker (Anna Thomson) searching for work floats a fragile line of sanity as she struggles to find friendship and companionship. Her tenuous grasp on reality further ...                See full summary »

name: Les sous-doués en vacances
summary_text: A group of friends are planning how to spend their summer vacation. One plans to go to the Seychelles with his American girlfriend. At the airport she dumps him for another guy. He has no ...                See full summary »
